roleset.name: to decompose or decay
roleset.note: ROT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'rot' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from rot.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: intransitive
example.text: El Salvador is destroying more than 1.6 million pounds of food that [*T*-1] had rotted in government warehouses , government officials said [0][*T*-2] .
